const months = ["Jan", "Mar", "Apr", "May"]; // Inserting an element at index 1 const months2 = months.toSpliced(1, 0, "Feb");
const values = [1, 10, 21, 2]; const sortedValues = values.toSorted((a, b) => a - b); console.log(sortedValues); // [1, 2, 10, 21] console.log(values); // [1, 10, 21, 2]
const str1 = "foo bar foo"; const regex1 = /foo/dg; console.log(regex1.exec(str1).indices[0]); // Output: Array [0, 2]
const items = [1, 2, 3]; const reversedItems = items.toReversed(); console.log(reversedItems); // [3, 2, 1] console.log(items); // [1, 2, 3]
